body:
Roses are red
Violets are glitched
the server is glitched
everything is glitched.
body_tagged:

title: Everything is glitched!

replies.body:
What did you expect? The update was just released and of course stuff needs to be fixed.

This happens all the time in game development and many other things, making posts like these only serve to make people look at you with a "Captain Obvious" glance or roll their eyes :/

replies.body: Give it time. Keep in mind that AvicusNetwork is still doing some updates (Atlas Hype).

replies.body:
Chill! It was a joke! It's 2:00 AM and I'm going to sleep, The server is going to be fixed when I wake so, the bugs won't affect me.
It was a joke. I hope devs are doing a good job! :p

replies.body: On our way to fixing it, please don't abuse the glitches. Makes it harder for all of us...
